name: JJRacing
description:
In a universe ruled by the Dark God, everyone is under his orders, and no one but the fastest being can challenge him to a race. The one that beats the Dark God in a race will be proved worthy, and so he will earn his freedom back.That is why every person fights each other in order to see who will be the one to challenge the Dark God.

Developers:
Jorge Durán - Twitter: @jorgedgq99
Jorge Sánchez - Twitter: @Koke232

Music by David De Vries

Team's twitter: @AlterEgoGameDev

Enjoy it!
